did.unittitle: Central Washington University Library Department, Curriculum Library Records
did.abstract: This collection contains correspondence regarding the operation of the Curriculum Library at Central Washington University, from 1964 to 1993..

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Curriculum Library operated as a separate department at Central Washington University, reporting to the Dean of Education within the library building until it was relocated to Black Hall in 1993. The Curriculum Library houses teaching materials and manuals for use by students in Central's education program.

scopecontent.p: This collection includes annual reports and procedures manuals regarding the Curriculum Library at Central Washington University, 1964-1993.

odd.p: Central Washington University began as the Washington State Normal School in 1891. In 1937, the school was rechristened the Central Washington College of Education. In 1961, the school became Central Washington State College and, finally, in 1977, Central Washington University.

arrangement.p: Chronological arrangement and alphabetical by subject

accessrestrict.p: Open to the public for educational research

prefercite.p: [Name of document or photograph number]. RG011-05-67, Central Washington University Library Department, Curriculum Library Records. Archives and Special Collections, Brooks Library, Central Washington University.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
